description.displayText: Danielle was our nanny for several months. She was great at planning exciting days and excursions for our children and I always knew our children were safe with her. She was on time to each shift, completed the responsibilities laid out in our contract and worked to act on any feedback immediately. She was thoughtful and had our girls work on projects and presents to give to my husband and myself on Father's Day and my birthday which was sweet and touching. Sadly our nanny arrangement didn't work out as the "fit" just wasn't there with her and my children, but I would recommend her as a nanny. She was hard working, punctual, and took feedback well. Unfortunately sometimes the kids personalities just don't mesh and we just needed to find a better fit. However she is a great, dependable childcare provider and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend her to others.

description.displayText: We were lucky enough to have Dani be our nanny for our two daughters (1.5 & 3.5 at the time) for 6 months. We would have loved for our time with Dani to be much longer but we unexpectedly moved out of state. Dani is a natural when it comes to care-giving, the right instincts and showing your kids genuine love and attention. She's patient, composed in any situation, and truly loves kids. She's also a great communicator with both the kids and the parents making each day a breeze. We're so thankful for the time she spent with our family!

description.displayText: Dani is the best of the best! She has a heart for children.  She is kind, honest, thoughtful, trustworthy and genuine.  In the 3 years that she served as our nanny for twins that were 2 and a 10 year old when she started she became a member of our family.  We adore Dani!
description.originalText: Dani is the best of the best! She has a heart for children.  She is kind, honest, thoughtful, trustworthy and genuine.  In the 3 years that she served as our nanny for twins that were 2 and a 10 year old when she started she became a member of our family.  We adore Dani!

description.displayText: Danielle was a nanny for my twin boys from 4 mos old until they went to preschool. She eventually did a nanny share and took care of my niece as well. Danielle has a knack for establishing a strong bond with children. My boys love her! She genuinely cares about them and I always felt they were safe in her care. She was always prompt. She did lots activities with the boys, took them to the park, etc.  My basement now looks like a preschool!

description.displayText: Danielle was a lifesaver for us! She took care of our 1 y/o son while we were in Atlanta. She is patient, loving and positive! I would highly recommend Danielle if you are looking for a dependable person!
description.originalText: Danielle was a lifesaver for us! She took care of our 1 y/o son while we were in Atlanta. She is patient, loving and positive! I would highly recommend Danielle if you are looking for a dependable person!

description.displayText: I worked with her 1.5 years and my daughter and my nephews loved her. She has many years of experience and it shows. She worked with my nephews from the time they were infants-2.5 years old. She was reliable and she always did fun, educational activities for the kids. She would help with breakfast, lunch, and dinner and do bath time. She also made sure she kept them on a regular schedule and she even helped with potty-training my daughter. We loved her and would definitely recommend her.
